item.title: About ‚ùì
item.description:
On this website, I share my thoughts and notes about things that I’m excited about and working on and hope to connect with people having a similar mindset. I’d love to hear from you!

Get in Touch ü§ù#

Connect with me! Stay up-to-date with what I’m sharing and working on:

  • GitHub: https://github.com/hidetoxin
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hidetoxin
  • RSS Feed: https://hidetox.in/index.xml

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è#

Thank you, dear reader! Thank you for taking the time to read my blog. And thank you to everyone contributing to the open-source community. If it wasn’t for you, this website wouldn’t exist.

item.title: Resume üìÑ
item.description:
Resume PDF download here ‚¨áÔ∏è

Interests üéÆ#

  • Learning new technologies ‚Äî Pulumi, Terratest, DiagramsAsCode
  • Trying new CLI tools and plugins that I find on Reddit ‚Äî Vim, CLI, Bash, Tmux, Yabai, MacOS, Linux
  • Ricing my Linux and MacOS systems to boost my productivity ‚Äî CLI, Bash, MacOS, Linux
  • Automating tasks on my systems as a challenge and also for freeing time on my schedule ‚Äî Go, AWS, Linux, Python, Ansible, Terraform, CloudFormation, ShellScripting
  • Reading comics, mainly japanese, korean and american ‚Äî Manga, Manwha, Manhua, Comics
  • Language learning particularly asian ones ‚Äî French, German, Korean, Chinese, Japanese
  • Playing basketball with my friends ‚Äî Astros, Lakers, BasketBall, SeoulKnights
  • Playing video games, mostly 2D fighting games ‚Äî FGC, Tekken, GuiltyGear, StreetFighter, KingOfFighters
  • Walking long distances with my dog, usually 3-5 hours on the weekends ‚Äî 5k, 10k, 15k, 20k, Husky, Walking

Skills üß∞#

  • AWS Cloud (Proficient)
